headline: Outgoing Tennessee Democrat says party 'facing extinction' in his state, relying on 'blind hope'
author: Timothy H.J. Nerozzi
sentences: One of his siblings is the current mayor of Nashville, and {full confession}, his father, Prentiss Cooper was the governor the year I was born so his signature is on mine and any other birth certificates issued during his term.

He is a friendly and outgoing chap when he is IN his district, but he dons his Absole suit of armor in Washington DC and there's not a dimes worth of difference between him and any other elected Democrat.
They are bullying their way thru the congressional re-districting and the republicans are losing, from what they were saying.
I suppose you could just resort to calling everyone in the state who doesn't vote Democrat to be a racist or homophobe.
I saw a drawing of Nadler's district in New York and it looked like a writhing or drunk snake.
Jim Cooper doesn't sound like a typical Democrat when he is talking to the local press.
They keep saying they have a messaging problem and that we just don't hear them.
From what I heard on Newsmax last night, don't ever count the democrats out.
What they will not accept is that we hear their messaging LOUD AND CLEAR.
We think they're morons and don't want the snake oil they're selling.
And this is why we plan on retiring to rural Tennessee!
He actually doesnâ€™t sound like a typical democrat.
He wants to work for a living like the rest of us.
Shows just how low their IQ's really are.
That appears to be the national strategy.
Pubbies had better get on board.
And his isn't the only one.
